REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1207 reute d f BC-TEXSCAN-HAS-TENTATIVE 03-30 0059

TEXT.TITLE: TEXSCAN HAS TENTATIVE REORGANIZATION PLAN
TEXT.BODY: Texscan Corp said it has agreed in principle with its lending banks -- United Bank of Arizona and Security Pacific Bank -- on a joint plan of reorganization. Subject to documentation, the plan will be filed within the next 10 days, Texscan said without providing further details. Reuter
